text: Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles were exes when the Prince of Wales married Princess Diana in 1981. However, there were constant allegations of infidelity between Camilla and the Prince of Wales throughout his marriage to Diana. In her famous TV interview in 1995 on BBC ’ s Panorama, Diana claimed she knew Charles and Camilla ’ s relationship continued throughout her marriage because of her “ women ’ s instinct ”.
